## isWholeNumber() function

Is the number a natural number including zero?

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isWholeNumber(n: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | <code>number</code> | number to test |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

## Remarks

`ℕ ∪ {0\}  = {0, 1, 2, ...\}`
